document_data.name: Scalesneer
document_data.home: [[Twilight Marsh]], [[Moonsea]]{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|24}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Scalesneer''' was a [[lizardfolk]] shaman of the [[Muckmarsh]] tribe in [[Twilight Marsh]] near [[Phlan]].
document_data.History: In [[1489 DR]], Scalesneer saved his chieftain [[Bogclaw]], curing his wounds. Afterward, he helped him to get revenge against the [[black dragon]] [[Throstulgrael]]. They decided to hire an adventuring party to raid Throstulgrael's lair, expected that he would be absent, in order to have vengeance against the dragon. However, at the meeting with the adventurers, they were attacked by a group of [[will-o'-wisp]]s and Scalesneer was killed.{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|7}}
